title: Bottom of the first: A veteran VCâ€™s take on the AI landscape
description: Ryan welcomes Tomasz Tunguz of Theory Ventures back to the podcast to talk about the intersection of AI and venture capital, the implications of AI on the labor market, and the future of AI applications. They delve into the optimization of AI models, the potential for parallelization, the importance of emerging standards in AI technology, and the role of open-source AI.
author: Eira May

text: April 8, 2025Ryan welcomes Tomasz Tunguz of Theory Ventures back to the podcast to talk about the intersection of AI and venture capital, the implications of AI on the labor market, and the future of AI applications. They delve into the optimization of AI models, the potential for parallelization, the importance of emerging standards in AI technology, and the role of open-source AI. Credit: Alexandra Francis
html:
April 8, 2025

Ryan welcomes Tomasz Tunguz of Theory Ventures back to the podcast to talk about the intersection of AI and venture capital, the implications of AI on the labor market, and the future of AI applications. They delve into the optimization of AI models, the potential for parallelization, the importance of emerging standards in AI technology, and the role of open-source AI.
